name: Varshith Puligadda - Full Stack Web Developer
description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm Varshith Puligadda, a skilled Full Stack Web Developer specializing in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). With a passion for creating powerful and dynamic web applications, I showcase my expertise and projects here. Explore my portfolio to discover my range of skills, from front-end development using React and JavaScript to back-end development with Node.js and Express. I'm dedicated to crafting high-quality, scalable, and user-friendly solutions. Let's connect and bring your ideas to life!
